text: Cheongnyeongnopo is a dong, or precinct, in Geumjeong-gu, Busan, South Korea. It was created in 1998 when the former districts Cheongnyeong-dong and Nopo- dong were amalgamated. ==See also== *Geography of South Korea *Administrative divisions of South Korea ==References== Category:Geumjeong District Category:Neighbourhoods in South Korea Category:Populated places established in 1998 Category:1998 establishments in South Korea
title: Cheongnyeongnopo-dong
